price: ហើយគ្រប់ៗរូបមានអ្នកនាំផ្លូវ និងអ្នកធ្វើសាក្សី(ម៉ាឡា-អ៊ីកាត់)បានមកជាមួយគេ(មកជួបអល់ឡោះនៅថ្ងៃបរលោក)។
arabic: وَجَآءَتۡ كُلُّ نَفۡسٖ مَّعَهَا سَآئِقٞ وَشَهِيدٞ

version.title: Khmer translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Khmer, published by Development Society of Muslim Cambodian Society. The second edition was issued in 2012.

meta.transliteration: wajāat kullu nafsin maʿahā sāiqun washahīdun
